name: Distribution of ballots; record
text: The chief election officer or the county clerk in county elections shall forward the official ballots, specimen ballots, and other materials to the precinct officials of the various precincts.  They shall be delivered and kept in a secure fashion in accordance with rules and regulations promulgated by the chief election officer.  In no case shall they arrive later than the opening of the polls on election day. 	A record of the number of ballots sent to each precinct shall be kept by the chief election officer or the clerk. [L 1970, c 26, pt of §2; am L 1973, c 217, §1(ll)]
